error_bad_recipient: You cannot award OP a delta as the moderators feel that allowing so would corrupt the delta system. If you were trying to show the OP how to award a delta please do so by clicking [here](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose/?to=%s&subject=remind&message=%s) and then clicking 'send'.
error_length: This delta is currently disallowed as your comment doesn't include enough text ([comment rule 4](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/rules#wiki_rule_4)). Please add an explanation for how /u/%s changed your view. Responding to this comment will cause me to recheck your delta comment.
error_submission_history: You have already awarded /u/%s a delta in this comment tree.
msg_first_body:
Congratulations! You've earned your first delta!

As you may already know, a delta (∆) is given when a comment has changed someone's view. For a more detailed explanation of the delta system, [see here](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/data["running_username"]).

/u/data["running_username"] has updated your user flair and created [your own wiki page](/r/%s/wiki/user/%s) which will be updated every time you earn a delta. If you do well, you may find yourself on our [leaderboards](http://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/leaderboards) (the monthly one is also featured in our sidebar).

Good luck, and happy CMVing!

_____

*[^I ^am ^a ^bot](https://github.com/alexames/data["running_username"])^, ^and ^this ^action ^was ^performed ^automatically. ^Please [^contact ^the ^moderators ^of ^CMV](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/changemyview) ^if ^you ^have ^any ^further ^questions ^or ^concerns.*
msg_remind:
To award a delta, the following criteria must be met:

1. A valid delta symbol (mobile users: type !delta) must appear somewhere in the message.

2. The comment must be at least %s long.

3. The delta cannot be awarded to the redditor that submitted this CMV topic.
msg_remove_low_effort: Your comment was removed as it contains a delta but does not explain why your view was changed.
msg_remove_remind: Your comment was removed as it appears you were trying to show someone how to use the delta system. Please use the [remind feature](/message/compose/?to=data["running_username"]&subject=remind) instead. Simply include the permalink (no context please!) in the message section.
msg_remove_abuse: Your comment was removed for abusing the delta system.
stop_body:
data["running_username"] has been issued a STOP command and is shutting down. Command issued by %s.

Reason: %s
stop_warning: data["running_username"] STOP command received. Shutting down.
